definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: grasp, support, attain (Aram. [[תְּמַךְ]] Pa. hold fast; cf. Ph. and OAram. [[תמכאל]] Ēl hath sustained Lzb:386 SAC:121 Cooke 361);—

grasp, lay hold of, c. acc. rei Ge 48:17 (E), Pr 31:19 (‖[[שׁלּח יד בְּ ]]); acc. pers. (wisdom) Pr 3:18 (‖[[מַחֲזִיק ]]); acc. rei (grasp and) wield Am 1:5, Am 1:8; Ps 16:5 (v. supr.) thou dost grasp my lot (i.e. take and cast it for me, cf. mod. Pal. 0llh yaqwm  bjaraly may Allah uphold my lot Bergheim:PEF 1894, 194); fig., Job 36:17 judgment and justice seize (thee; but v. obscure and doubtful); Pr 5:5 her steps lay hold of Shₑ’ôl (keep the path to it); lit., c. [[ב]] rei Is 33:15, [[ב]] pers. Pr 28:17 (or sub
; mng. dub.); lay hold of, attain, honour, wealth (acc.) Pr 11:16, Pr 11:16.
hold up, support, c. [[בְּיָדָיו]] Ex 17:2 (E); fig., [[ב]] pers. Is 42:1, Ps 41:13, Ps 63:9; acc. pers. Is 41:10 ([[ב]] instr.), Pr 29:23 (opp. [[הִשְׁפִּיל]]),
hold, keep, c. acc. rei Pr 4:4 let thy heart keep my words (‖[[שָׁמַר ]]); hold firmly Ps 17:5 ([[ב]] loc.; opp. [[נָמׂ֫טוּ]]).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[וּבְחַבְלֵי חַטָּאתוֹ יִתָּמֵָךְ]] Pr 5:22 in the cords of his sin is he seized (‖[[לָכַד ]]).
